founder.title: Expertise that turns vision into reality.
founder.name: Saad Chahoubi
founder.description: We blend marketing and data to build campaigns that convert and retain. Lasting client relationships. Transparency. Measurable ROI.
founder.extendedDescription: Performance marketing rests on data and strategy. Measurable results. Predictable ROI. Trust with partners.

aboutIntro.whoWeAreBody: Founded in 2013 in Casablanca. Full service digital marketing agency. 150+ companies across four continents. Top 10 agencies to watch.
aboutIntro.visionBody: Leverage technology for businesses. Transform digital marketing with advanced tactics and strategy.
aboutIntro.missionBody: Our experts deliver top quality, on time. Focused on results in an evolving industry.

aboutServices.label: Services
aboutServices.title: Growing sales through exceptional services
aboutServices.description: We put our expertise at your service.

shapeFuture.headline: Shape your future with 63 Agency
shapeFuture.subtitle: 63 Agency : Digital Marketing Expertise
shapeFuture.paragraph: Preferred agency for B2B and B2C. Innovative solutions. High-performing campaigns.
shapeFuture.col2Body: Global experience. We bring visions to life. We innovate and lead.
shapeFuture.col3Body: Boost revenue. Content, email and influence strategies that deliver.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.a1: We design and deploy strategies (SEO, social, ads, content) to grow visibility and revenue.
faq.a2: 360° approach: brand, content, paid media, lead gen, CRM and automation (chatbot, AI).
faq.a3: All online promotion (web, social, ads, email, SEO) to attract and convert prospects.
faq.q4: How do you generate qualified leads?
faq.a4: Systems: content, campaigns, funnels and qualification. Prospects become opportunities.
faq.a5: Audit, goals, strategy, deployment, optimization. Regular reporting for ROI.

aboutFaq.title: FAQs
aboutFaq.a1: Transparency. Measurable performance. Concrete results. Predictable ROI. Trust.
aboutFaq.a2: Since 2013: B2B/B2C lead gen, Meta/Google/LinkedIn ads, sites, content, funnels. 150+ companies, four continents.
aboutFaq.a3: Structured process: audit, objectives, strategy, deployment, optimization. Reporting and metrics (CPL, ROI).
aboutFaq.a4: Profitable acquisition systems, not just campaigns. 360°: content, media, funnels, automation.
aboutFaq.q5: How do you adapt to industries?
aboutFaq.a5: We adapt strategy, channels and messaging per sector (education, real estate, B2B, etc.).
aboutFaq.a6: Yes. Morocco, Europe, soon Dubai. Campaigns and targeting adapted to local markets.
aboutFaq.q7: What is unique about your SEO/SEM?
aboutFaq.a7: SEO, paid search and content aligned for lead gen. Organic + paid. Continuous optimization.
aboutFaq.q8: How do you ensure high ROI?
aboutFaq.a8: Measurable goals. Systems over one-off campaigns. Data-driven optimization. Regular reporting.
